authors.name: Prabhat Sharma
authors.bio: Prabhat Sharma is the founder of OpenObserve. He has deep background in cloud, kubernetes, observability and more. He has interests in machine learning, liberal arts, economics and systems architecture. In his spare time he spends time playing with his kids.

authors.name: Hengfei Yang
authors.bio: Hengfei Yang is the founding engineer at OpenObserve. He has extensive experience in distributed system development. He is passionate about open source and has interests in traveling, music and photography.

authors.name: Zhao Wei
authors.bio: Zhao Wei is an engineer at Jidu, with a strong background in cloud computing, Kubernetes and observability. He is currently an APM expert at Jidu.

authors.name: Ashish Kolhe
authors.bio: Ashish is obsessed with building high performance systems with simplicity in mind. He has vast experience in multiple disciplines like front end, back end, streaming, analytics and more.
